React, {Component} from 'react' import {connect} from 'react-redux' import {bindActionCreators} from 'redux' import styled, {ThemeProvider} from 'styled-components' import {NavLink} from 'react-router-dom' import { Audio, Box, Column, Dictionary, Grid, Img, PlayBox, Spacer, RememberSection, Subtitle, Text, Section, Wrapper } from '../../../components' import {Info, Masthead} from '../components' import PlayImg from '../../../assets/images/play.svg' // fetch level 1 vocabulary and store in redux import actionCreators from '../../Admin/Vocabulary/actions.js' import fetchWords from '../../Admin/Vocabulary/actions.js' // cdn import cdnUrl from '../../../../src/config/secrets.js' const cdn = cdnUrl.cdn import sharedPhrases from '../../../../src/data/shared/phrases.js' // phrases const hello = cdn + sharedPhrases.greetings.hello.korean.informal.audioUrl const helloFormal = cdn + sharedPhrases.greetings.hello.korean.formal.audioUrl const byeStaying = cdn + sharedPhrases.greetings.bye.korean.staying.formal.audioUrl const byeLeaving = cdn + sharedPhrases.greetings.bye.korean.leaving.formal.audioUrl const goodMorning = cdn + sharedPhrases.greetings.goodMorning.korean.informal.audioUrl const goodMorningFormal = cdn + sharedPhrases.greetings.goodMorning.korean.formal.audioUrl class KoreanLevel1 extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = {} this.assignStateProps = this.assignStateProps.bind(this) } componentDidMount() { this.props.actions.fetchWords().then(res => { this.assignStateProps() }) } onClick(e) { e.preventDefault() document.getElementById(e.target.name).play() } assignStateProps(e) { let words = this.props.vocabReducer var val = words[ (function() { for (var item in words) return item })() ] val.words.map(item => { let {name, audioUrl} = item this.setState({ [item.word]: cdn + audioUrl }) }) } render() { return (
ㄱ 기역

a non-aspirated 'k' sound. Almost like a 'g' sound

 ㄲ 쌍기역

a 'g' sound formed from the throat

 ㄴ 니은

'n' sound as in name

ㄷ 디귿

a non-aspirated 't' sound

 ㄸ 쌍디귿

'th' sound as in thing

ㄹ 리을

an 'l' like sound or 'd' sound depending on position

 ㅁ 미음

'm' sound as in mom

ㅂ 비읍

a non-aspirated 'p' sound

 ㅃ 쌍비읍 a 'b' sound formed from the throat ㅅ 시옷

a soft 's' sound as in soft

ㅆ 쌍시옷

's' sound as in sell

ㅇ 이응

'ng' sound as in song or is silent

ㅈ 지웃

a non-aspirated 'ch' sound

 ㅉ 쌍지읒

'j' sound from the throat

 ㅊ 치읓

'ch' sound as in chair{' '}

ㅋ 키읔

'k' sound as in kite

ㅌ 티읕

't' sound as in time

ㅍ 피읖

'p' sound as in pig

ㅎ 히읗

'h' sound as in hat

ㅏ 'ah' sound ㅑ 'yah' sound ㅓ in between 'uh' and 'oh' sound ㅕ in between 'yuh' and 'yoh' sound ㅗ

'o' sound as in doughnut

ㅛ

'yo' sound as in yo yo

ㅜ

'ew' sound as in shoe

ㅠ

'you' sound as in you

ㅡ

'eu' sound as in look

ㅣ

'e' sound as in eat

가

'ga' sound as in ga ga

나

'na' sound as in not

다

'da' sound as in daughter

라

'ra' sound as in rock

마

'ma' sound as in ma ma

바

'ba' sound as in ba

사

'sa' sound as in sa

아

'a' sound as in autumn

자

'ja' sound as in jolly

차

'cha' sound as in cha

카

'ca' sound as in caught

타

'ta' sound as in taught

파

'pa' sound as in pond

하

'ha' sound as in hall

안영 Hello (informal) 안영하세요 Hello (formal) 안영 Bye (informal) 안영히계세요 Bye (formal, to someone who is staying behind) 안영히가세요 Bye (formal, to someone who is going away) 좋은 아침, 좋은 아침이야,{' '} 좋은 아침이에요 Good Morning (informal) 좋은 아침입니다 Good Morning(formal)
Go Practice! Channel Selection & Room Etiquette
) } } const mapStateToProps = state => { return { vocabReducer: state.vocabReducer } } const mapDispatchToProps = dispatch => { let fetchWords = actionCreators.fetch return { actions: bindActionCreators( { fetchWords }, dispatch ) } } export default connect(mapStateToProps, mapDispatchToProps)(KoreanLevel1) "]}
